data.title: iVillage Acquires Promotions.com
data.meta_description: On March 2, 2002, iVillage acquired information services company Promotions.com for 13M USD
data.text:
Healthology

New York, New York, United States

Healthology, Inc. is an online health media company that produces and distributes video- and article-based health and medical information on the Internet.
